channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Improved Include Page
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Improved Include Page

item.title: CVE-2021-24845|2024-08-03T19:42:17.220Z -- unknown -- improved%20include%20page
item.description: The Improved Include Page WordPress plugin through 1.2 allows passing shortcode attributes with post_type & post_status which can be used to retrieve arbitrary content. This way, users with a role as low as Contributor can gain access to content they are not supposed to.
